document.text:
From: (USANYS) [Contractor]" 
To:  )"  
Subject: RE: US v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) - discovery production 
Date: Fri, 12 Mar 2021 17:22:19 +0000 
Attachments: 2021.03.12_Maxwell_Discovery_Letter_v2.pdf 
Hey 
I'm so sorry to do this but I just caught something on the cover letter. The initial bates range in the index reads 
SDNY_GM_02742936 when it should instead be SDNY_GM_02742963. I'm terribly sorry. Would you like me to 
email the updated cover to defense? 
Thanks, 
From: 
Sent: Friday, March 12, 2021 12:14 PM 
To: Christian R Everdell - Cohen & Gresser LLP 
Cohen < 
>: 
Bobbi Sternheim ; 'BOBBI C STERNHEIM' 
;  Laura 
Menninger < 
; Jeff Pagliuca 
Cc: >; 
(USANYS) [Contractor] 
Subject: US v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) - discovery production 
Counsel, 
(USANYS) 
< 
Mark S. 
Pursuant to the Court's Order dated November 18, 2020, today we are producing materials regarding victims who are not 
referenced in Indictment number 5120 Cr. 330 (AJN). Attached please find the accompanying cover letter. The 
production is small enough to produce via an FTP site. Would you please send us a link to use for this production? 
We. send a CD containing a copy of this production to the MDC for your client to review as well. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00018988
